{{cpp/experimental/reflect/title|Alias}}
{{cpp/experimental/reflect/navbar}}
{{ddcl | since=reflection_ts | header=experimental/reflect | 1=
template&lt; class T &gt;
concept Alias = Named&lt;T&gt; &amp;&amp; ScopedMember&lt;T&gt; &amp;&amp; /* see below */;
}}

The {{tt|Alias}} [[cpp/language/constraints|concept]] is satisfied if and only if T reflects a [[cpp/language/typedef|{{tt|typedef}} declaration]], an [[cpp/language/type_alias|alias-declaration]], a [[cpp/language/namespace_alias|namespace alias]], a [[cpp/language/template_parameters|template type parameter]], a [[cpp/language/decltype|decltype-specifier]], or a declaration introduced by [[cpp/language/using_declaration|using-declaration]] (Note: The {{tt|Scope}} of an {{tt|Alias}} is the scope that the alias was injected into).
